function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of contact with nature in residential buildings","Impact":"Reduced satisfaction with living conditions during lockdown","Mitigation":"Creating green spaces within residential buildings, promoting outdoor access","Technologies":"Green building design, urban planning for outdoor spaces","People":"Residents of apartment buildings","Owner":"Property developers and local governments"},{"Description":"Feeling of being trapped in an apartment during curfew","Impact":"Reduced overall satisfaction with life in an apartment","Mitigation":"Provide accessible outdoor spaces within apartment complexes, promote balcony gardening","Technologies":"Smart building design for outdoor access, balcony gardening setups","People":"Residents of apartment buildings","Owner":"Property managers and local governments"},{"Description":"Impossibility of self-isolation in common areas of the building","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within the building","Mitigation":"Enforce strict self-isolation guidelines, limit the number of people in common areas","Technologies":"Building access control systems, ventilation and air purification","People":"Residents of apartment buildings","Owner":"Property managers and local health authorities"}]}
